hero.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
hero.description:
6-year infrastructure and full-stack engineer specializing in large-scale distributed systems design and operations.

Leading infrastructure optimization and developer productivity initiatives for a ‚Ç©500B annual revenue MSA-based e-commerce platform, achieving 99% error detection reduction, 90% deployment speedup, and 50% infrastructure cost savings.

Operating high-availability environments handling 100K daily users, 500GB daily network traffic, 20TB monthly data lake, and 3TB monthly distributed tracing data.

profile.title: Profile
profile.aboutMeParagraph1: An engineer who excels at systematically analyzing complex technical challenges and deriving optimal solutions through collaboration.
profile.aboutMeParagraph2: Built extensive cross-functional project experience across 4 companies, collaborating with teams of varying scales and cultures. Demonstrated strong ability to understand technical requirements and deliver stable solutions in enterprise client engagements with LG and SK.
profile.aboutMeParagraph3: Specializes in designing and operating large-scale distributed system architectures based on cloud-native technologies including Kubernetes, AWS, Kafka, and OpenTelemetry. Started with Django/Spring/Gin backend development and built expertise in ML pipelines and data processing, then expanded to full-stack capabilities with React/Vue/Flutter. Holds CKA, LFCS, and 3 AWS certifications validating infrastructure and cloud expertise.
profile.aboutMeParagraph4: Currently serving as SRE for Daewoong Group's TheShop, leading hybrid cloud infrastructure operations. Spearheading initiatives including OpenTelemetry-based observability platform, Kafka messaging architecture, and Airflow-based data pipeline automation to ensure system stability. Actively driving team development velocity and code quality improvements through AI-powered development tools.

monitoring.title: üìä Monitoring System Enhancement
monitoring.subtitle: Legacy End-to-End Observability Environment
content: Period: 2024.06 ~ Present ¬∑ Project leading
Challenge: Limitations of legacy Scouter-based monitoring and delayed error detection due to observability gaps in containerized service mesh environments
Solution: Led migration to unified Observability system based on OpenTelemetry, Grafana stack, Prometheus, and AWS
Collected End-to-End distributed tracing, metrics, and logs on a single platform in an environment mixing legacy monolithic systems (10+ years) and new MSA
Built Collectors on 12 servers and integrated with Grafana dashboards
Contributing to OpenTelemetry open-source project on AWS and Container-related issues

dataLake.title: üóÑÔ∏è Business Metrics Visualization with Data Lake
dataLake.subtitle: Long-term Data Analysis Environment using AWS Glue & Athena
content: Challenge: Limitations in long-term data analysis and incident response due to 7-day log retention
Solution: Built data lake architecture using AWS Glue (Spark-based) and Athena (Hive-based)
Used S3 as central storage for 10-year log retention
Optimized query performance with Parquet compression and time/date-based partitioning
Achievement: Expanded log retention 142x (7 days ‚Üí 10 years)
Built Grafana dashboard visualizing key e-commerce metrics like retention and purchase conversion rates from collected data

theshop.title: üè• TheShop Pharmaceutical/B2B E-commerce Platform SRE
theshop.subtitle: Hybrid Architecture Operations ¬∑ ‚Ç©500B Annual Revenue
content: Situation & Task: Overall SRE responsibility for stable operation and scaling of Daewoong Group's core B2B/B2C e-commerce platform 'TheShop'
‚Ç©500B annual transaction volume, 100K daily users, 20TB+ monthly data processing
Action 1: Designed and operated hybrid infrastructure mixing AWS ECS Fargate serverless container environment and on-premise (CentOS/Ubuntu) Docker environments
Centralized microservice traffic management via APISIX Gateway and Nginx, applied Rate Limiting and Circuit Breaker patterns
Automated infrastructure provisioning with CloudFormation (IaC), achieved 50% monthly cost reduction through EC2 Right-sizing and S3 lifecycle policies
Action 2: Identified and optimized performance bottlenecks across complex application stack: React/Next.js frontend, Spring Boot/Node.js backend APIs, Oracle DB
Enhanced legacy monitoring with OpenTelemetry, reduced new system error detection time by 99% from 18 hours to under 10 minutes through distributed tracing
Built Apache Kafka and Redis Sentinel clusters for stable processing of 1 billion daily messages
Result: Achieved business continuity, cost optimization (50% reduction), deployment automation (90% faster), and dramatically reduced MTTR (Mean Time To Recovery)

gateway.title: üèóÔ∏è Gateway & Traffic Management
gateway.subtitle: IDSTrust Gateway Integration
content: Integrated shop.co.kr and connect.shop.co.kr IDSTrust gateways
Efficient traffic management with Connect API integration
Optimized Platform and BO service traffic operations
Built APISIX-based API Gateway with Eureka service discovery integration
Implemented dynamic service routing and load balancing via Spring Cloud Eureka and APISIX integration
Applied RBAC to all traffic
Configured high availability (HA) environment
Successfully integrated Kafka and Airflow in APISIX POC

airflow.title: üîÑ Apache Airflow Data Pipeline
airflow.subtitle: 5 HA Clusters ¬∑ Batch/CDC/Statistics Automation
content: Designed and built 5 Airflow clusters based on HA architecture
Automated Batch processing, CDC (Change Data Capture), and statistics aggregation
Distributed workflow management using PostgreSQL metadata DB and Redis message broker
Optimized large-scale data pipeline performance with Celery Executor-based parallel task processing
Managed complex data dependencies and scheduling with DAG (Directed Acyclic Graph)
Ensured data pipeline stability with real-time monitoring dashboard and alert system
Improved analytics efficiency through automated data warehouse ETL processes

ixiStudio.title: ü§ñ LG IXI AI Solution (IXI Studio)
ixiStudio.subtitle: Generative AI Enterprise SaaS Platform
content: Platform for creating and managing customized internal AI models for enterprises
Real-time AI response streaming using Server Side Events (SSE)
Achieved tight development deadline by improving POC quality for Chat and Code Editor
Built stable service in Kubernetes with Istio environment
Resolved Vite prerender build issues with CodeMirror library (open-source modification)
Data visualization with konva.js, element-ui, apache echarts
Expanded technical spectrum through SSE protocol experience

ixiAdmin.title: üõ†Ô∏è LG IXI Admin Tool (IXI Admin)
ixiAdmin.subtitle: AI Service TTS & NLP Model Management Platform
content: Forbidden word, log, weight configuration and monitoring
First web service development in LG Violet (Kubernetes) environment
Row-level kubectl management for horizontal pod autoscaler, Notebook resource, Argo
Resolved Kubernetes + Istio networking issues through CVT testing
Resolved ECR image management instability (based on Kubernetes certification)
Resolved security issues through WAF

drone.title: üöÅ SK Drone Control Platform
drone.subtitle: 70% 3D Rendering Improvement with Three.js LOD Optimization
content: Efficient processing of 500MB+ large 3D data
70% performance improvement with Three.js LOD (Level of Detail) optimization

Large image optimization: 85% loading time reduction and main thread blocking prevention for drone photos up to 50MB per image using WebP conversion + Progressive Loading + PWA Web Worker background processing
Built Keycloak SSO authentication system
Extracted GPS (altitude/latitude/longitude) from photo metadata (EXIF)
Real-time drone location tracking with SK T Map API integration
Resolved AWS CloudFront + PWA cache conflict issues
Supports simultaneous real-time control of 50 drones

robotPlatform.title: ü§ñ LG Logistics Robot Control Platform
robotPlatform.subtitle: 100 Simultaneous Control, Proprietary M2PX Algorithm
content: Real-time robot status/location/battery control via Yujin Robot Gateway integration
Provided mobile/desktop service with PWA + responsive web
Developed proprietary M2PX algorithm (Meter to Pixel coordinate conversion)
Real-time device communication with RabbitMQ + AWS IoT Core MQTTS-WebSocket
Provided dashboard, AS registration, notification history management screens
Achieved average response time under 200ms
Resolved floor-by-floor map scale-based location display through reference code analysis

inoutbox.title: üíº Inoutbox
inoutbox.subtitle: Dongdaemun Fashion B2B/B2C Platform (Solo Full-Stack Development)
content: Built Dongdaemun-specialized fashion wholesale/retail platform
Retail: Inventory management, sales management, order management, delivery management
Wholesale: Product registration, order management, delivery management, POS, credit management
Purchasing: Fast delivery process via mobile app
Developed RESTful API server based on Go-Gin
Implemented frontend and POS system based on Vue.js
Developed cross-platform app (Android/iOS) with Flutter
Ensured printer compatibility through device-specific DOM/CSS optimization for various POS printer models
Built real-time incident alert system with GCP Logging + Slack
Built Firebase, GCP infrastructure and integrated FCM Push notifications

campi.title: üèïÔ∏è Camping SNS App (Campi)
campi.subtitle: Custom Image Editing Library Development in Dart
content: Camping SNS platform (campsite booking, reviews, photo sharing)
User/influencer camping content posting and product sales
Request to add image editing features during Flutter app development
Developed image editing library directly in Dart (no library available in early Flutter ecosystem)
Implemented Pinch-to-zoom, Cropping, Rotation, Flip features
Handled aspect ratio and clip processing for gestures (scale, pan, drag)
Firebase, GCP infrastructure and FCM Push notifications
Improved Dart language understanding and library creation experience

virtualTryOn.subtitle: AI Model Integration Web Service (National Project)
content: Virtual fitting room web service based on AI department models
Applied Intelligent Personalization Solution
Integrated server management for 3 models: tops/bottoms, shoes
Python Django backend + Vue.js frontend
Solo development collaborating with AI department
Real-time model selection and fitting result display

content: Overall management from outsourcing selection to project execution and maintenance
WBS, requirements definition, development progress, deliverable management

coreProject.title: Core Project: Direct Sales Management System
